name: Latios & Latias Pokemon Showdown Style
description: A latios & latias based CSS made for Pokemon Showdown servers. If you see any error or something that looks weird, please PM me in a server such as Origin
additional_info:
To see this stylesheet download Stylish and add this style, and then load Pokemon showdown.
